inclusion.criterion: Participant is willing and able to give informed consent for participation in the trial.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In the Investigator's opinion, is able and willing to comply with all trial requirements.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female ages 18 or above with migraine headache
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: 3 or greater occurrences of migraine per month
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: no prior use of neuromodulation for migraine headache
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior use of neuromodulation for migraine headache
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Laminectomy, laminotomy or discectomy within 12 months of enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active psychiatric disorders will be excluded (e.g. use of antipsychotic medication, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients diagnosed with history of significant mood disorder will be excluded (e.g., depression or anxiety with adequate control would be acceptable).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Scheduled elective surgery or other procedures requiring general anaesthesia during the trial.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any other significant disease or disorder which, in the opinion of the Investigator, may either put the participants at risk because of participation in the trial, or may influence the result of the trial, or the participant's ability to participate in the trial.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participants who have participated in another research trial involving an investigational product in the past 12 weeks.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with recurrent bilateral headache. She has migraine headache and is under treatment.
